description:
1 Silver Birch Reduce crown to previous pruning points . Clear roof of adjacent private property (actionable nuisance). 
2 Silver Birch Reduce lateral crown spread to form narrower crown. Reduce up to 2.5m to clear adjacent properties (actionable nuisance). 
4 Silver Birch Lift crown all round to 3.5m to clear footway & buildings. 
5 Silver Birch Lift crown all round to 3.5m to clear footway & buildings. 
7 Norway Maple Reduce lateral crown spread by 1m all round to clear building & lift to 3.5m. 
6 Norway Maple Fell & grind out stump. Plant replacement tree in open space 
14 Pillar Cherry - Fell to ground level. 
15 Pillar Cherry - Fell & grind out stump. Plant replacement tree in open space. 
16 Wild Cherry - Reduce to previous pruning points (max 2m branch length). 
18 Whitebeam - Reduce to previous pruning points (max 1m branch length). 
19 Silver Birch - Lift crown all round to 3.5m to clear footway road & buildings. 
20 Sycamore - Completely remove lowest limb growing towards building. Reduce remaining crown to previous pruning points (2.5m branch length).
21 Sycamore - Reduce crown to previous pruning points (2m branch length). 
22 Turkey Oak - Lift branch ends to 5m all round. Remove deadwood. 
23 Silver Birch - Light overall crown reduction max 1m branch length. 
24 Sycamore - Reduce crown to previous pruning points (1.5m branch length). 
25 Sycamore - Reduce crown to previous pruning points (1m branch length). 
28 Sycamore - Reduce crown by 2m branch length all over. 
30 Sycamore - Reduce crown to previous pruning points (by 2m branch length). 
33 Beech - Lift crown to 5m all round. Reduce on building side to give 3m clearance.
34 Rowan - Remove deadwood & lift crown to 3m over footway. 
35 Common Lime - Reduce lateral crown spread by 3m over garden & 1.5m road. Lift crown to 5m & remove epicormics. 
36 Common Lime - Remove basal & epicormic growth. Cut back to clear street light. 
37 Norway Maple -  Reduce to previous pruning points
